title: What's wrong with these players???????????????????
body:
What is with these players who just feed?
There are so many of them, every game.
How on earth are platinum players feeding 0/5+ in lane before 10 minutes??????

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Their brains are constructed in such a way that they find joy in watching others suffer. Being around for years got me to accept that fact, that NA has more Kotomine Kirei than I'd like to admit.

sometimes 


people have bad games

WOOOOOOAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH
Because rank is basically meaningless past high silver. A combination of dumb luck, boosting, higher-ranked friends, some guy that decided to smoke weed and play league at 2AM, stealth trolls, ect.
